document_data.name: ''Skie's Locks and Bolts''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Skie's locks and bolts''''' was a [[magic item]] that ''[[wizard lock|wizard locked]]'' everything nearby.
document_data.Description: This item looked like a small ornate [[lock (item)|lock]] and [[silver]] key.
document_data.Powers: When the key was inserted into the lock and turned all doors, windows, and related objects within {{SI|50|ft|long=yes}} would slam shut and become ''wizard locked''. These items would remained locked until successfully dispelled, the key was twisted again, or ''Skie's locks and bolts'' was moved further than 50 feet away.
document_data.History: Specialty priests of [[Waukeen]] called [[goldeye]]s had a chance of receiving a ''Skie's locks and bolts'' as one of the magic items they were given upon their admission to the clergy.
